channel.title: Genai on my tech ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Genai on my tech ramblings

item.title: Building an Azure DevOps Copilot using .NET 8, Semantic Kernel and Azure OpenAI GPT-4o
item.description: This post demonstrates how to create an Azure DevOps Copilot that utilizes a small subset of the Azure DevOps REST API. To achieve this, we will be using Semantic Kernel along with .NET 8 and Azure OpenAI.

item.title: Building a Q&A app capable of answering questions related to your enterprise documents using AWS Bedrock, AWS Kendra, AWS S3 and Streamlit
item.description: The purpose of this post is to demonstrate how easy is to build a basic Q&A app capable of answering questions about your company's internal documents. This time, we will use only AWS services to build it (plus Streamlit for the user interface).
